id: collectiveevolution--2022-07-06--COVID – Where Do We Go From Here
title: COVID – Where Do We Go From Here
content:
If you ’ re feeling the fatigue of navigating the news during COVID you ’ re not alone .
I personally know a lot of people who feel this way .
But given what has happened over the last few years through the decision making of government , is how a good time to stop paying attention ?
This is a tough question , because in many ways it ’ s healthy to know when to say enough , but when the stakes are as high as they are now , surely we have to stay in the game no @ @ @ @ @ @ @ Setty and David Helfrich .
Madhava is a physician who has been actively engeged in examining and reporting on COVID related literature since the onset of the pandemic , and David is a lawyer who has been curiously reflecting on the nature of COVID restrictions and their affect on rights , as well as much of COVID literature in general .
We ’ ll talk about COVID news fatigue , the value of information , some key takeaways we must consider when looking at the COVID era , and as always we ’ @ @ @ @ @ @ @ philosophical and metaphysical questions asking whether COVID has applied an evolutionary pressure for the consciousness of humanity .
author: Joe Martino
